alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; McCone; Prairie (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 6:55PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Garfield, south central Valley, southwestern McCone and northwestern Prairie Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 655 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles northwest of Hell Creek Rec Area to 10 miles west of Hillside. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jordan, The Pines Rec Area, Hell Creek Rec Area, Flowing Wells Rest Area, Cohagen, Nelson Creek Rec Area, Rock Creek Rec Area, Hillside, Haxby, Crow Rock, Watkins and Van Norman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; McCone; Prairie
